Interface IRegistrationServices

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistrationController
public interface IRegistrationServices
Defines registration services for both Officers and Managers:
  • Retrieve an officer’s own registrations
  • Add a new registration
  • Retrieve registrations for a manager’s projects
Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addRegistration(Registration r)
    Adds a new registration to the system.
    Map<Integer,Registration>
    ManagerGetProjectRegistration(Manager manager)
    Retrieves all registrations for projects managed by the given manager.
    Map<Integer,Registration>
    OfficerGetOwnRegistration(Officer officer)
    Retrieves all registrations submitted by a specific officer.

  • Method Details

    • OfficerGetOwnRegistration

      Map<Integer,Registration> OfficerGetOwnRegistration(Officer officer)
      Retrieves all registrations submitted by a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officer - the Officer whose registrations to fetch
      Returns:
      map of registration IDs to Registration objects for that officer

    • addRegistration

      void addRegistration(Registration r)
      Adds a new registration to the system.
      Parameters:
      r - the Registration object to add

    • ManagerGetProjectRegistration

      Map<Integer,Registration> ManagerGetProjectRegistration(Manager manager)
      Retrieves all registrations for projects managed by the given manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the Manager whose project registrations to fetch
      Returns:
      map of registration IDs to Registration objects for those projects
